Package main

Class Battle

java.lang.Object
main.Battle
public class Battle extends Object
This class implements the battle between two teams
Author:
angusburrowes and Jed Atkinson

    • diceRoll

      public int diceRoll()
      rolls the dice which determines if a monsters attack hits or misses. if the attacking monster rolls higher their attack hits.
      Returns:
      boolean depending on if the attacker will hit or miss

    • playerAttack

      public int playerAttack(int playerRoll, int enemyRoll)
      determines damage done from attack by the player.
      Parameters:
      playerRoll - int that player rolled
      enemyRoll - int that enemy rolled
      Returns:
      int Returns damage done if playerRoll higher, 0 if enemyRoll higher or -1 for reroll

    • playerHeal

      public void playerHeal()
      heals the players monster in battle if they have a healing potion available

    • enemyAttack

      public int enemyAttack(int enemyRoll, int playerRoll)
      Determines damage done by enemy attack
      Parameters:
      enemyRoll - enemy dice roll
      playerRoll - player dice roll
      Returns:
      int Returns damage done if enemyRoll higher, 0 if playerRoll higher or -1 for reroll
